section: The servant is dependent on his Lord
title: 1. The servant is dependent on his Lord #1
description: All human beings depend on Allah for their welfare and prevention...

section: Conditions for Dua to be successful
title: 2. Conditions for Dua to be successful
description: Prophet (ﷺ) used to say after every compulsory prayer...
translation: There is none worthy of worship except Allah...
